item.title: Tom Holland Recaps First Day Back in Spider-Man Suit for ‘Brand New Day’: “It Feels Different This Time”
item.description: The actor’s fourth ‘Spider-Man’ film hits theaters on July 31, 2026.

item.title: Tom Holland Recaps First Day Back in Spider-Man Suit for ‘Brand New Day’: “It Feels Different This Time”
item.description: The actor’s fourth ‘Spider-Man’ film hits theaters on July 31, 2026.

item.title: James Marsden Says It Feels Like a “Homecoming” to Reprise Cyclops Role for ‘Avengers: Doomsday’
item.description: The actor previously appeared in the first three ‘X-Men’ films.

item.description: The actor previously appeared in the first three ‘X-Men’ films.

item.title: Tom Holland Teases ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day’ With Behind the Scenes Set Photos
item.description: The first-look images come a few days after Sony unveiled Holland’s new Spidey suit and Mark Ruffalo was announced as part of the film’s cast.

item.title: Tom Holland Teases ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day’ With Behind the Scenes Set Photos
item.description: The first-look images come a few days after Sony unveiled Holland’s new Spidey suit and Mark Ruffalo was announced as part of the film’s cast.

item.title: Tom Holland’s New Spider-Man Suit for ‘Brand New Day’ Revealed
item.description: The actor’s fourth leading film as the superhero hits theaters next year and will include Jon Bernthal’s Punisher and Mark Ruffalo’s Hulk.

item.title: Tom Holland’s New Spider-Man Suit for ‘Brand New Day’ Revealed
item.description: The actor’s fourth leading film as the superhero hits theaters next year and will include Jon Bernthal’s Punisher and Mark Ruffalo’s Hulk.

item.title: Jeremy Renner Teases His MCU Return: “I’m Sure We’ll End Up Doing Season 2” of ‘Hawkeye’
item.description: “My body’s getting ready for something like that,” the Oscar nominee said of the physical demands that come with portraying Clint Barton/Hawkeye.

item.title: Jeremy Renner Teases His MCU Return: “I’m Sure We’ll End Up Doing Season 2” of ‘Hawkeye’
item.description: “My body’s getting ready for something like that,” the Oscar nominee said of the physical demands that come with portraying Clint Barton/Hawkeye.

item.title: Review: Fantastic Four: First Steps is the best film version so far
item.description: The plot makes no sense, but that retro-futuristic Tomorrowland vibe and superb cast make it (mostly) work.
